publications.abstract: This work studies different topological lasso motifs in proteins, and compares them to their polymer statistics

publications.title: A Topological Selection of Folding Pathways from Native States of Knotted Proteins
publications.abstract: We analyze topologically possible folding pathways of knotted proteins.

publications.title: Molecule Edit Graph Attention Network: Modeling Chemical Reactions as Sequences of Graph Edits
publications.journal: Journal of Chemical Information and Modeling
publications.abstract: We introduce a state-of-the-art model for chemical retrosynthesis prediction building on local graph edits

publications.title: Topoly: Python package to analyze topology of polymers
publications.abstract: We introduce a Python package to analyze topology of polymers.
